cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your access will remain active until the end of the current billing period.

student.question: Do you offer student discounts?
student.answer: Absolutely! We offer a 50% discount for students and educators with a valid .edu email address.

data.question: What happens to my data?
data.answer: Your data is yours. We encrypt everything at rest and in transit. You can export or delete your data at any time.

switch.question: Can I switch plans?
switch.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Prorated charges will apply automatically.
